Package homework1

Class Interaction

java.lang.Object
homework1.Interaction
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comment, Like
public class Interaction extends Object
The homework1.Interaction Class implements interaction object. homework1.Interaction objects holds unique interaction id, account id who interacted, post id which interacted. homework1.Interaction object gives inheritance to 2 class.

2023-03-17
